original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady, Rupee at 322/330 against US dollar at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were steady at open on Friday while rupee opened weaker, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 30.30/31.00 percent on Friday, steady from 30.60/31.00 percent on Thursday.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 28.00/28.30 percent, steady from 27.80/28.10 percent from Thursday.
The three months bill was quoted at 26.00/30 percent, steady from 25.75/26.00 percent.
Sri Lanka rupee opened at 322/330 against the US dollar from 319/325 from a day earlier. (Colombo/ March23/2023)
